You must initiate a WebSocket connection with the message bus.

ï»¿

Add a button to both the profile and IM modules. This only places the button and does not set up a handler for when the button is clicked.

To receive notifications when the UI button is executed you must register an interest on the topic. Note the address property matches the data.responseAddress field of the above method. After you register you can then click the button in the UI to see a log in the console printed.

This example shows a banner announcement across the top of the UI.

You can also start a conversation with a predefined initial message. Note this API call can take a few seconds to reflect in the UI.

Kill the WebSocket connection if you no longer need to interact with Symphony.
